name: Ascent To Descent
description:
A game prototype created by Gamez Eternal inspired by Descent

With the production time of nine days, I proudly present to you:

Ascent To Descent - A Space Shooter.

An atmospheric space game where your mission is to destroy the reactor core of this malfunctioning space station. 

You play the game in first person, just as if you were inside the cockpit of your spaceship!

Game Information

Controls: Use W, A, S ,D to move, Q and R to Rotate and mouse to look around and shoot.

Credits: Robert Arnborg for music and sound.
